attributes.title: Cool Man Juice
attributes.caption: Steffie, Chelsea, and Jackie discuss how to become a community manager, self care tips, and weird coffee obsessions.

attributes.title: The Spit-Take

attributes.description: It's almost RTX and our RT Community Managers get emotional as they discuss the shows, self-care, and more!

attributes.description: The RT Community Managers are joined by Emily Weeks! They talk about self-care, RT news, and so much more!

attributes.title: Chaos in Human Form
attributes.caption: The RT Community Managers are getting ready for Extra Life and things are chaotic! Who better to bring on then Achievement Hunter's resident weirdo Alec Agabon to discuss self-care, mugs, and more!

attributes.description: The RT Community Managers welcome Hector Gonzales onto the show to discuss self-care, nature, and getting poked in the brain!

attributes.title: Pie and Peace
attributes.caption: The RT Community Managers are tired. That's why this episode Chelsea is baking up an apple pie while Steffie just rambles about anything.

attributes.title: Accept Your Inner Bro
attributes.caption: This week, the RT Community Managers are joined by Achievement Hunter's Producer, Sarah Weems! They talk about community news and fanfiction. Mostly fanfiction. It's like 90% fanfiction.

attributes.title: Conspiracy Theories

attributes.description: The RT Community Managers are joined by Kayla Milton! They discuss what's happening around RT, self-care tips, and conspiracy theories.

attributes.title: Set a Goal
attributes.caption: It's the last Community & Coffee of 2020 and the RT Community managers are feeling mushy! They discuss the past year and what they hope to accomplish in the future.
